snippet: The Supreme Court turned down a case concerning a New York State law that requires people seeking permits to carry guns in public to demonstrate that they have a special need for self-protection.
abstract: Supreme Court turns down case concerning New York State law requiring people seeking gun carry permits to demonstrate that they have need for self-protection.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court turned down a case concerning a New York State law that requires people seeking permits to carry guns in public to demonstrate that they have a special need for self-protection.

headline.seo: Supreme Court Declines New York Gun Law Case
headline.main: Justices Refuse Case on Gun Law in New York
headline.print_headline: Justices Refuse Case On Gun Law In New York
